```{r}
#| eval: false
#| include: false
library(generative) # devtools::install_github("marcusvolz/generative")
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# VARS ====
seed <- 821
n <- 400
n_circles <- 4
r_0 <- 500
eps <- 500
eps_big <- 5000
p_defect <- 0.1
delta <- 2.02

# data ====
df <- procedural_ring(seed, n, n_circles, r_0, eps, eps_big, p_defect, delta)

# plot ====
p <- ggplot() +
  geom_segment(aes(x, y, xend = xend, yend = yend), df, size = 0.025, alpha = 0.05) +
  coord_equal() +
  theme_void()

# save ====
ggsave("posts/CV/procedural-ring.png", p, width = 800, height = 800, units = "px")
```
